default.title: likebutter - AI-Powered Fan Content Creation Platform
default.description: Transform your fan love into art, music, and virtual content with Butter Studio. Create AI fan art, covers, videos, and digital goods with cutting-edge AI technology.
default.keywords: AI fan content, fan art creator, AI music cover, virtual idol, digital goods, fanmeeting, AI image generation, fan content platform

home.title: likebutter - Create AI-Powered Fan Content in Minutes
home.description: The ultimate AI platform for fans. Generate stunning fan art, create music covers, design digital merchandise, and bring your fandom to life with professional-quality AI tools.
home.keywords: AI fan art generator, AI music cover maker, fan content creator, digital fan merchandise, AI video editor, fandom platform, K-pop fan content, anime fan art

studio.title: Butter Studio - All-in-One AI Creative Suite
studio.description: Access powerful AI creative tools in one place. Create images, music, videos, and digital products with professional-grade AI technology designed for creators and fans.
studio.keywords: AI creative studio, content creation tools, AI image generator, AI music maker, digital content studio, creative AI platform

virtualCasting.title: Virtual Casting - AI Character Image Generator | Butter Studio
virtualCasting.description: Generate stunning AI character images with virtual casting. Create custom fan art, virtual idols, and character designs with advanced AI image generation technology.
virtualCasting.keywords: AI character generator, virtual casting, AI portrait maker, character design AI, virtual idol creator, AI fan art

butterCover.title: ButterCover - AI Music & Voice Cover Generator | Butter Studio
butterCover.description: Create unique AI music covers and fan songs with your favorite artist's voice. Generate high-quality vocal covers and original music using advanced AI technology.
butterCover.keywords: AI music cover, AI voice generator, fan song creator, vocal cover AI, music generation, AI singing voice, cover song maker

fanmeetingStudio.title: Fanmeeting Studio - Create AI Virtual Fan Meetings | Butter Studio
fanmeetingStudio.description: Experience virtual fanmeetings with AI-generated content. Create personalized fan interactions, virtual meet-and-greets, and memorable moments with your favorite artists.
fanmeetingStudio.keywords: virtual fanmeeting, AI fan interaction, virtual meet and greet, fan experience, AI celebrity interaction, online fanmeeting

digitalGoods.title: Digital Goods Creator - Design AI Fan Merchandise | Butter Studio
digitalGoods.description: Design and create stunning digital merchandise for fans. Generate custom wallpapers, photo cards, stickers, and digital collectibles with AI-powered tools.
digitalGoods.keywords: digital merchandise, fan goods creator, AI wallpaper maker, digital collectibles, photo card designer, fan merchandise

stylist.title: AI Stylist - Virtual Fashion & Outfit Designer | Butter Studio
stylist.description: Style your favorite characters with AI-powered virtual fashion. Create unique outfits, experiment with different looks, and design custom fashion concepts.
stylist.keywords: AI fashion designer, virtual stylist, outfit generator, AI clothing design, fashion AI, character styling

archive.title: My Archive - Manage Your AI Creations | Butter Studio
archive.description: Store and manage all your AI-generated content in one place. Access your fan art, music covers, videos, and digital creations anytime.
archive.keywords: content archive, creation manager, AI content storage, portfolio, fan content library

login.title: Log In to likebutter - Access Your AI Creative Studio
login.description: Log in to likebutter to access your AI creative tools, saved projects, and fan content library. Continue creating amazing fan content.
login.keywords: likebutter login, sign in, user account, access studio

signup.title: Sign Up for likebutter - Start Creating AI Fan Content
signup.description: Join likebutter and start creating professional-quality fan content with AI. Sign up for free and access powerful creative tools for fans and creators.
